title: Jill Stein
added: Stein played a significant role in several crucial [[Swing state|battleground states]], drawing a vote total in three of them — [[2016 United States presidential election in Wisconsin|Wisconsin]], [[2016 United States presidential election in Michigan|Michigan]] and [[2016 United States presidential election in Pennsylvania|Pennsylvania]] — that exceeded the margin between Donald Trump and Hillary Clinton.<ref>Haberman, Maggie et al (September 22, 2020) [https://www.nytimes.com/2020/09/22/us/politics/green-party-republicans-hawkins.html?searchResultPosition=1 "How Republicans Are Trying to Use the Green Party to Their Advantage."] ''New York Times.'' (Retrieved September 24, 2020.)</ref>
